Welcome to the Android Teleprompter!

This app creates a text overlay on your screen.

1. Grant overlay permission when prompted
2. Press the camera button to start recording
3. Text will scroll automatically
4. Tap anywhere to pause/resume
5. Use bottom controls to adjust speed

The teleprompter will stay visible over the camera app for easy reading while recording.
